attributes.title: Abomination
attributes.review:
1 “total and complete shutdown of Muslims entering the United States until our country’s representatives can figure out what is going on.”

2 “I have a great relationship with the blacks. I’ve always had a great relationship with the blacks,” 

3 A “I have black guys counting my money. … I hate it,”

3 B “‘Laziness is a trait in blacks. It really is, I believe that.”

4 “The only guys I want counting my money are short guys that wear yarmulkes all day.”

5 A “A well-educated black has a tremendous advantage over a well-educated white in terms of the job market.”

6 A “When Mexico sends its people, they’re not sending their best. They’re not sending you. They’re not sending you. They’re sending people that have lots of problems, and they’re bringing those problems with us. They’re bringing drugs. They’re bringing crime. They’re rapists. And some, I assume, are good people,” 

6 B “But I speak to border guards and they tell us what we’re getting. And it only makes common sense. It only makes common sense. They’re sending us not the right people. It’s coming from more than Mexico. It’s coming from all over South and Latin America, and it’s coming probably— probably— from the Middle East. But we don’t know. Because we have no protection and we have no competence, we don’t know what’s happening. And it’s got to stop and it’s got to stop fast.”

7 “This is no longer about peaceful protesting, this is about angry, violent, criminal mobs taking over certain (Democrat run) cities. It is a lack of political leadership in that city.” 

8 “That & Flag decision has caused lowest ratings EVER!” (Complaining about NASCAR removing the confederate flag”

9 A “told him that the Military is with him all the way. Any difficulty and we will assume control but, when the looting starts, the shooting starts. Thank you!”

9 B "These THUGS are dishonoring the memory of George Floyd, and I won't let that happen,"

10 “I’m leading in the polls with the Hispanics. I mean, you look at Nevada, I’m leading in the polls with the Hispanics because I produce jobs, and they know it. I have thousands of Hispanics that work for me, my relationships to Hispanics is better than those groups,” 

11 “Who the f knows? I mean, really, who knows how much the Japs will pay for Manhattan property these days?”
